samples.question: Do you think it is better for children to have few close friends or many casual friends?
samples.transcript: >> I would say it is better to have more close friends because a person can share their true feelings and some of the secrets with the close friends and not everything can be shared with the casual friends. >> Mhm.
samples.transcript_original: >> I would say it's better to uh have more close friends because uh a person can share their true feelings and some of the secrets with the close friends and not everything can be shared with the casual friends. >> Mhm.

samples.question: Do you think a child's relationship with friends can be replaced by that with other people like parents or other family members?

samples.question: How important is fashion to you?
samples.transcript: >> Oh, fashion is indeed important to me. because it really helps me to be more creative. It really improves my personality and boost my confidence. samples.question: How often do you use food delivery apps?
samples.transcript: >> Well, to be very honest, I am a very health consscious person. However, sometimes whenever I am out of time whenever I have something important to do in hurry at that time I only rely on these applications. >> Okay.
